reasons: The beauty of your soul shines so bright
You make me want to seek and love God more
You drive me to become the best I can be
Your smile is like light to everyone who sees it
You are compassionate
You are genuine and true
You are completely honest
Your simple perspectives are always filled with wisdom
Your joy is contagious
You do not fear the expression of yourself or others
Even when you are angry, you remain in control
You see the best in people
You are strong
You are courageous
You are not judgmental
You are trustworthy
I love to see you laugh
Your happiness makes me happy
I love the sound of your voice
I love listening to you
I love the vibe around you
I love your soul in all its ever-growing beauty
I love your mind, its intriguing intellect and infinite potential
I love your heart in its unapologetic affection
I love your body, for it is a temple of God
I love you in your joy
I love you in your sadness
I love you in your anger
I love you in your disappointment
I love you in your success
I love you in your failure
I love you in your pride
I love you in your humility
I love your gracefulness
I love your faithfulness
I love your discipline
I love your commitment
I love your elegance
I love your light
I love your shine
I love the potential within you and want to see it manifest
I love everything God wants you to become
I love the way you pray
I love the way you study the Word of God
I love the way you handle your relationships
I love your intentionality
I love your patience
I love your eyes and cannot wait to look into them again
I love your lips and the words that flow from them
I love your hair, not too obedient, not too stubborn
Have you seen the state of your body?

message.intro: From the moment you walked into my life, ordinary days stopped being ordinary.
body: Even chaos somehow made sense with you nearby.
You are my calm in the noise, my reminder that love can be gentle and strong at the same time.
Every version of the future I imagine looks better because you are in it.
